spec_data.Name: mk-files
spec_data.Description:
The mk-files package provides some bmake macros derived from the NetBSD
bsd.*.mk macros.  These macros allow the creation of simple Makefiles to
build all kinds of targets, including, for example, C/C++ programs and/or
shared libraries.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 10:49:23 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Support files for bmake, the NetBSD make(1) tool
